languages.text: "Вы недооцениваете Махария, Ваша Светлость. Человек его талантов — настоящая находка для того, кому он будет служить". {n}Регина Зауэрбэк говорит о муже спокойно, но без особой теплоты в голосе.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Вы недооцениваете Махария, Ваша милость. Человек его талантов — настоящая находка для того, кому он будет служить".{n}Регина Зауэрбек говорит о муже спокойно, но без особой теплоты в голосе.{/n}

languages.text: "You underestimate Macharius, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. A man of his talents is a treasure to the one he serves." {n}Regina's voice is calm as she speaks about her husband, but it is not particularly warm either.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Вы недооцениваете Махария, Ваша Светлость. Человек его талантов — настоящая находка для того, кому он будет служить". {n}Регина Зауэрбэк говорит о муже спокойно, но без особой теплоты в голосе.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "You underestimate Macharius, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. A man of his talents is a treasure to the one he serves." {n}Regina's voice is calm as she speaks about her husband, but it is not particularly warm either.{/n}

"You underestimate Macharius, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. A man of his talents is a treasure to the one he serves." {n}Regina's voice is calm as she speaks about her husband, but it is not particularly warm either.{/n}

languages.text: 「陛下はマハリウスを過小評価なさっております。彼のような才能を持つ者は、その主君にとって宝となりましょう」{n}レジーナの声は夫と話すときと同様に穏やかだが、特別な温かさは込められていない。{/n}
languages.original_text: "You underestimate Macharius, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. A man of his talents is a treasure to the one he serves." {n}Regina's voice is calm as she speaks about her husband, but it is not particularly warm either.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「陛下はマハリウスを過小評価なさっております。彼のような才能を持つ者は、その主君にとって宝となりましょう」{n}レジーナの声は夫と話すときと同様に穏やかだが、特別な温かさは込められていない。{/n}

languages.text: “是您低估了马卡里乌斯，大人。像他这样有能之人，会是他主人的宝贵财富。”{n}蕾吉娜在谈到她丈夫时声音很平静，但也并没有特别热情。{/n}
languages.original_text: "You underestimate Macharius, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. A man of his talents is a treasure to the one he serves." {n}Regina's voice is calm as she speaks about her husband, but it is not particularly warm either.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “是您低估了马卡里乌斯，大人。像他这样有能之人，会是他主人的宝贵财富。”{n}蕾吉娜在谈到她丈夫时声音很平静，但也并没有特别热情。{/n}

languages.text: «Subestima a Macharius, {mf|milord|milady}. Un hombre de su talante es un tesoro para su señor». {n}La voz de Regina parece sosegada cuando habla de su marido, pero tampoco es especialmente cálida.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You underestimate Macharius, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. A man of his talents is a treasure to the one he serves." {n}Regina's voice is calm as she speaks about her husband, but it is not particularly warm either.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Subestima a Macharius, {mf|milord|milady}. Un hombre de su talante es un tesoro para su señor». {n}La voz de Regina parece sosegada cuando habla de su marido, pero tampoco es especialmente cálida.{/n}

languages.text: « Vous sous-estimez Macharius, Votre Seigneurie. Un homme aux multiples talents comme lui est un véritable trésor pour celui qu'il sert. » {n}Régina parle de son mari sur un ton calme, mais dénué de chaleur.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You underestimate Macharius, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. A man of his talents is a treasure to the one he serves." {n}Regina's voice is calm as she speaks about her husband, but it is not particularly warm either.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Vous sous-estimez Macharius, Votre Seigneurie. Un homme aux multiples talents comme lui est un véritable trésor pour celui qu'il sert. » {n}Régina parle de son mari sur un ton calme, mais dénué de chaleur.{/n}

languages.text: "Ihr unterschätzt Macharius, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Ein Mann mit seinen Talenten ist ein Schatz für jeden, dem er dient." {n}Reginas Stimme ist ruhig, als sie über ihren Mann spricht, aber auch nicht gerade warm.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You underestimate Macharius, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. A man of his talents is a treasure to the one he serves." {n}Regina's voice is calm as she speaks about her husband, but it is not particularly warm either.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ihr unterschätzt Macharius, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Ein Mann mit seinen Talenten ist ein Schatz für jeden, dem er dient." {n}Reginas Stimme ist ruhig, als sie über ihren Mann spricht, aber auch nicht gerade warm.{/n}

languages.text: "Macharius'u hafife alıyorsunuz {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Onun gibi hünerli bir adam, hizmet ettiği kişi için bir nimettir." {n}Regina, kocası hakkında konuşurken sesinde sakinliğini korumakla birlikte pek sıcakkanlı da sayılmaz.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You underestimate Macharius, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. A man of his talents is a treasure to the one he serves." {n}Regina's voice is calm as she speaks about her husband, but it is not particularly warm either.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Macharius'u hafife alıyorsunuz {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Onun gibi hünerli bir adam, hizmet ettiği kişi için bir nimettir." {n}Kocası hakkında konuşurken Regina'nın sesi sakinliğini korusa da, pek sıcakkanlı da sayılmaz.{/n}
